original_text: And, behold, there was a man which had his hand withered. And they asked him, saying, Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days? that they might accuse him.
korean_text: 한쪽 손 마른 사람이 있는지라 사람들이 예수를 고발하려 하여 물어 이르되 안식일에 병 고치는 것이 옳으니이까

sentences.original_text: And, behold, there was a man
Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days?
sentences.korean_translation: 안식일에 병을 고치는 것이 율법에 합당하냐?
